rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with Art Deco inspired decorative elements and a reception desk. Designed to create a welcoming ambiance in line with Vastu principles by having the main entrance facing east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Lounge area with high ceilings and decorative moldings reminiscent of Art Deco style. Features large windows for ample natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining space adjoining the living room, with an emphasis on symmetry and balance. Designed to enhance social interactions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. Incorporates Art Deco detailing with geometric patterns.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for privacy, with Art Deco trim details. Includes built-in storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring balance and symmetry in the layout. Minimalist Art Deco touches.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with a personal en-suite bathroom. Decorated subtly in Art Deco style.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Functional study with built-in shelves and ergonomic seating, featuring Art Deco motifs for an elegant workspace.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Conveniently placed servant quarters with basic amenities. Ensures privacy while maintaining service efficiency.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility area for laundry and storage, integrated seamlessly with other services.

rooms.name: Balcony/Verandah
rooms.description: Semi-outdoor area for relaxation and fresh air. Designed with Art Deco balustrades.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with efficient layout and classic Art Deco cabinetry. Includes a dining nook for small meals.

rooms.name: Service Passage
rooms.description: Functional corridor linking servant quarters, kitchen, and utility room.

rooms.name: Wardrobe/Laundry Closet
rooms.description: Compact space designed for storage of linens and laundry supplies. Minimalist in design to complement the Art Deco theme.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large, welcoming entrance door aligned with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Front Window
openings.description: Art Deco styled window that allows ample natural light and air circulation.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Door leading to the balcony/verandah area, providing access for fresh air and relaxation.

villa_type: Art Deco G+1 6BHK villa with Servant Quarters
